title: OUC Finals with Razer
body:
Hey guys,

Oceanic University Championship finals is on today at 2pm AEST.  University of Auckland vs University of New South Wales!

Razer comms are hosting an online viewing party on their official LoL Community (http://rzr.to/lolcommunity) with a mini giveaway along with it.
· 2 x Deathadder Chroma

Lets watch some great LOL action  - http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania

https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpt1/t31.0-8/11921782_1680998212135612_7386751119179898336_o.jpg
